image1.alt: Large group of youth having fun throwing powder paint in the air at a youth retreat.

content.text1: We love families! Our kids and youth teams walk alongside the next generation in learning to love and follow Jesus, while equipping parents to disciple their kids at home. Weâ€™d love to connect with you through our Sunday and midweek experiences.

image1.alt: A map of meeting house midweek locations.

content.text1: It's pretty simple: choose a city, connect with the local Meeting House community, discover how you can participate online or in person.
content.link1AriaLabel: View a map of all midweek locations

content.text1: We walk alongside our youth as they learn to love and follow Jesus, sharing his message with others. Our program includes Jr. Highs (grades 6-8) and Sr. Highs (grades 9-12) with a mix of online and in-person events. We connect midweek to have fun, engage in small groups, and talk about Jesus.

image1.alt: Two teenage girls laying on the floor and laughing.

list.title: Parents and Guardians
list.text: We are passionate about helping with spiritual parenting. Click here to see what your kids learned last Sunday and access helpful resources.
list.imageAlt: Two parents walking with their young child.
